    # vuex-persist

    vuex-persist

import VuexPersistence from 'vuex-persist'
const vuexLocal = new VuexPersistence({
  storage: window.localStorage
})
const store = new Vuex.Store<State>({
  state: { ... },
  mutations: { ... },
  actions: { ... },
  plugins: [vuexLocal.plugin]
})

  state: { ... },
  mutations: { ... },
